author: Kathy Orton
title: Mortgage rates hold steady after weeks of turbulence - The Washington Post
description: Mortgage rates hold steady after weeks of turbulence The Washington Post Why More Homeowners Should Take Advantage of Low Mortgage Rates Yahoo News Mortgage rates are near record lows, but home buyers may face an uphill battle in securing them MarketWatch Fre…
content:
The 30-year fixed rate has been on a wild ride the past several weeks. It plummeted to a historic low of 3.29 percent on March 5, soared to 3.65 percent two weeks later and then went back to its current level last week.
